thread.title: Life Insurance Company Expands Quick Online Sales Program
thread.title_full: Life Insurance Company Expands Quick Online Sales Program - WSJ

author: Leslie Scism
title: Life Insurance Company Expands Quick Online Sales Program
text:
A Massachusetts Mutual Life Insurance Co. unit is expanding into more states with a pathbreaking method for selling term life-insurance policies online in roughly 20 minutes, as insurers seek to boost sales by speeding up the application process.
The Haven Life unit launched the online program in Massachusetts in May, and the service is now available in eight more states: Georgia, Illinois, Michigan, New Jersey, North Carolina, Ohio,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
